vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.13.22;
father of: Ahiman (H0289), Sheshai (H8344) and Talmai (H8526); also called Anakim at Deu.1.28; 2.10,11,21; 9.2; 1x,22; 14.12,15;
Group of a.naq (עֲנָק "Anak" H6061)
§ Anakims = "long-necked"
a tribe of giants, descendants of Anak, which dwelled in southern Canaan
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞衲族 这个種族名稱 形容詞在希伯來文的意思是 "頸"
巨人之一支派, 亞納的後裔, 住在南迦南
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚衲族 这个种族名称 形容词在希伯来文的意思是 "颈"
巨人之一支派, 亚纳的后裔, 住在南迦南
